content.body: shu: can abstract closures write to the aliases they capture, do you figure?
content.formatted_body: shu: can abstract closures write to the aliases they capture, do you figure?

content.body:
the answer appears to be "no":
> When an Abstract Closure is created, it captures the value that is associated with each alias at that time.
content.formatted_body:
the answer appears to be "no":

When an Abstract Closure is created, it captures the value that is associated with each alias at that time.
